abstract: Corinna da Fonseca-Wollheim reviews devotional music recital featuring soprano Christine Brewer and organist Paul Jacobs playing 19-ton Kuhn organ, at Alice Tully Hall, part of Lincoln Center's White Light Festival.
lead_paragraph: Ms. Brewer was accompanied by Paul Jacobs on the 19-ton Kuhn organ as part of the Lincoln Center White Light Festival.

headline.main: Review: Christine Brewer in ‘Prayer,’ at Alice Tully Hall
headline.print_headline: Sonic Riches for Ears Divine and Human

snippet: Ms. Brewer was accompanied by Paul Jacobs on the 19-ton Kuhn organ as part of the Lincoln Center White Light Festival.
